Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Finally!{Line} There you are.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Finally!{Line} There you are.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Where the hell were you?{Line} I was lookin’ all over the place.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Where the hell were you?{Line} I was lookin’ all over the place.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“We’re SeeDs now, right?{Line} So guess what!?{Line} We got our own rooms, baby!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“We’re SeeDs now, right?{Line} So guess what!?{Line} We got our own rooms, baby!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Your new room is right across{Line} from your old one.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Your new room is right across{Line} from your old one.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“That’s what I was asked to tell you.{Line} Man, it took me forever!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“That’s what I was asked to tell you.{Line} Man, it took me forever!”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“This area has been completely{Line} secured. Report to another area.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“This area has been completely{Line} secured. Report to another area.”

Monologue.Current: Yes, sir{Line}Enough of this pretending
Monologue.Original: Yes, sir{Line}Enough of this pretending

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yes, sir.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yes, sir.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Get out of our way.{Line} We’re with the headmaster.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Get out of our way.{Line} We’re with the headmaster.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“What...!? Another one of{Line} Cid’s followers!? Prepare to die!”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“What...!? Another one of{Line} Cid’s followers!? Prepare to die!”

Monologue.Current: “Интересно, сколько человек{Line} сегодня собирается сдавать экзамен?”
Monologue.Original: “I wonder how many are going{Line} to pass the SeeD exam today?”

Monologue.Current: “Какая разница, всё равно тесты завалили...”
Monologue.Original: “But that written test{Line} sure was hard...”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, ты хотя бы с письменной{Line} частью справилась.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, at least you made it{Line} to the written part.”

Monologue.Current: “А я ещё с хвостами не разобралась.”
Monologue.Original: “I still haven’t finished{Line} all my credits yet.”

Monologue.Current: “Мне тоже ещё много сдавать!”
Monologue.Original: “I know.{Line} I have a lot left, too!”

Monologue.Current: “Давайте вместе пойдём на пересдачу!”
Monologue.Original: “It’d be nice if we could{Line} all take it together.”

Monologue.Current: “Ага. Будет круто, если мы{Line} ещё и всё сдадим!”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah. Even cooler if{Line} the 3 of us pass.”

Monologue.Current: “Слушайте, а ведь скоро фестиваль...”
Monologue.Original: “Oh yeah... The Garden Festival’s{Line} coming up soon, isn’t it?”

Monologue.Current: “Ага. На площади уже сцену соорудили.”
Monologue.Original: “Uh huh.{Line} They’re setting stuff up by the quad.”

Monologue.Current: “Помойму, сделали уже больше,{Line} чем за весь предыдущий год.”
Monologue.Original: “Probably a lot more work than last year.”

Monologue.Current: “А кто сейчас возглавляет комитет?”
Monologue.Original: “So like, who’s on the committee{Line} this year, anyway?”

Monologue.Current: “Помойму, новенькая,{Line} которую недавно перевели.”
Monologue.Original: “I think it’s that new girl{Line} who just transferred here.”

Monologue.Current: “Вау... Внезапно...”
Monologue.Original: “Wow... Really...”

Monologue.Current: “Девчонки... мы ведь...{Line} Останемся подругами после выпуска?”
Monologue.Original: “Umm... We’ll all still be friends{Line} even after we graduate, right...?”

Monologue.Current: “А чего это тебя вдруг заинтересовало?”
Monologue.Original: “What’s this all of a sudden?”

Monologue.Current: “Ну... Не знаю...{Line} Просто...”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, ummm...{Line} Nothing really...{Line} Just wondering, I guess...”

Monologue.Current: “Хехехе. Ты как считаешь?”
Monologue.Original: “Hehe.{Line} What do you think?”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, если подумать...{Line} МЫ точно останемся, а вот...”
Monologue.Original: “Let’s see... I know WE will, but...”

Monologue.Current: “Да расслабься!{Line} Я просто шучу.”
Monologue.Original: “Take it easy!{Line} I’m just kidding!”

Monologue.Current: “Конечно мы будем вместе!”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah, it would be really cool{Line} if the 3 of us are still together.”
“YEAH!!!”

Monologue.Current: “Что?{Line} Вы поцапались?”
Monologue.Original: “Huh?{Line} You guys fightin’?”

Monologue.Current: “Это всё из-за...”
Monologue.Original: “It’s his fault.”

Monologue.Current: “ОПЯТЬ?!{Line} Я скажу из-за чего это!..”
Monologue.Original: “WHAT!?{Line} You’ve gotta be KIDDING!”

Monologue.Current: “Тьфу, иди ты...”
Monologue.Original: “Pshaw, whatever...!”

Monologue.Current: “Эй! Эй! Спокойно! Полегче...”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, hey, calm down... Easy...”

Monologue.Current: “Так с чего всё началось?”
Monologue.Original: “So what started all this?”

Monologue.Current: “Из-за чего произошёл инцидент?”
Monologue.Original: “So, how’s it going{Line} since that incident?”

Monologue.Current: “Какой ещё инцидент?”
Monologue.Original: “Huh? What incident?”

Monologue.Current: “Ррррр... вы поцапались, помнишь?”
Monologue.Original: “You were fighting, remember?”

Monologue.Current: “Мы?!.. Да мы друг друга пальцем не тронули!”
Monologue.Original: “Fighting...?{Line} We were never fighting, were we?”

Monologue.Current: “Ага!”
Monologue.Original: “Nope!”

Monologue.Current: “Ай, ну вас...”
Monologue.Original: “Haa... Whatever...{Line} I wasn’t really worried anyway...”

Monologue.Current: “Хочешь с нами сыграть?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “You wanna play cards with us?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
Monologue.Original: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
